introducing_rigorous_mathematics.Name: Introducing Rigorous Mathematics
introducing_rigorous_mathematics.Description HTML: Writing some notes to introduce advanced Mathematics rigorously, including content in the great book Principles in Mathematical Analysis by Walter Rudin.

on_behavior_of_cauchy_products.Name: On behavior of Cauchy products
on_behavior_of_cauchy_products.Description HTML: Study Cauchy products of summation, building knowledge from the theory of (discrete) (maybe infinite) summation.

square_of_difference_of_roots_of_depress.Name: Roots being square of difference of roots of a depressed cubic
square_of_difference_of_roots_of_depress.Description HTML: Forming an equation with roots being square of difference of roots of a depressed cubic equation, related to the Cartan-Tartaglia formula.

uniform_charge_density_plane_forms_unifo.Name: Uniform charge density plane forms uniform electric field
uniform_charge_density_plane_forms_unifo.Description HTML: An interesting Physics phenomenon with my little explanation. Idea by my teacher.

imo_hk_with_sol.Name: IMO HK with Solutions
imo_hk_with_sol.Description HTML: Solution and more of IMO HK contests, by Charles Fu and I.

polygon_area_formula.Name: Area formula for simple polygons
polygon_area_formula.Description HTML: About a formula giving the area of a general simple polygon, from the great book Discrete and Computational Geometry.

anti-derivative_polynomial_over_(1+x^4).Name: Anti-derivative of any polynomial over (1+x^4)^?
anti-derivative_polynomial_over_(1+x^4).Description HTML: Result of anti-derivative of any rational function in the form of a polynomial over (1+x^4)^n for some natural number n.

maximize_standard_deviation_given_range.Name: Maximize the standard deviation given the range of data
maximize_standard_deviation_given_range.Description HTML: Rigorous proofs of the problem to maximize the standard deviation of a set of data given the range of them. The proofs used techniques that personally, I think is exceptionally inspiring. Special thanks to Mr. Fu Jia Cheng Charles and Mr. Cheng Tak Sum.

2022_Physics_0_R2_Term_Paper.Name: On `Philosophy of mathematics and natural science'
2022_Physics_0_R2_Term_Paper.Description HTML: Understanding on some selected topics from `Philosophy of mathematics and natural science', in a narrative style.
